title: South Africa Gasoline Price Drops to Four-Year Low on Oil, Rand
description: South Africa’s gasoline price will fall the lowest level in nearly four years following the global drop in crude and a stronger rand.
content: South Africa’s gasoline price will fall the lowest level in nearly four years following the global drop in crude and a stronger rand.
